name: All The Light Touches
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You replace your vision with that of a source of light you can see. Anything the light can reach, you can see. Your body is blinded, and you have disadvantage on attack rolls and Strength and Dexterity rolls in this state.

The spell does not give you extraordinary range of vision - targeting the sun, for instance, will prevent you from seeing anything happening in the world, on account of being too small to see.
